page.title: 09SOMERSHAM CARNIVAL (2)
page.content: ADULTS ARE THEN JUDGED AND OTHER EVENTS TAKE PLACE DURING THE COURSE OF THE AFTERNOON. IN 1985 THESE INCLUDED A BABY SHOW,TUG OF WAR, PUPPET AND MAGIC SHOW, MOTORCYCLE DISPLAY, SOMERSHAM TOWN BAND AND THE OUSE VALLEY MAJORETTES.IN THE EVENING THERE IS A DISCO FROM 7.00 TO 9.00 FOR THE UNDER TENS AND FROM 9.30 TO 11.30 FOR THE 10 - 14 AGE GROUP. THE CARNIVAL CONTINUES ON SUNDAY WITH A SIX A SIDE CRICKET KNOCKOUT COMPETITION. IN THE AFTERNOON THERE IS THE COUNTRYCRAFT EXHIBITION COMPRISING EXHIBITS FOR THE VARIOUS COMPETITIONS. THESE INCLUDE COOKERY, WINEMAKING, FLOWER ARRANGING HANDICRAFT, PHOTOGRAPHY AND WOODWORK, WITH PAINTING, NEEDLEWORK AND POTTERY FOR THE CHILDREN. THE CARNIVAL IS CONCLUDED BY A UNITED CHURCH SERVICE IN THE MARQUEE ON SUNDAY EVENING.
